text:
ARTA | Senior Software Engineer | New York, New York | ONSITE | Full-time | https://shiparta.com

ARTA Shipping, Inc., an NYC-based startup focused on disrupting the high end, specialized transport space (fine art shipping, to begin with), is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to help provide a solid technical foundation and accelerate growth. Our website and API are built with Python/Flask, React/Redux, and Postgres and built on Docker, Drone, Spinnaker, Kubernetes, and AWS.

Email hello@shiparta.com or visit https://angel.co/arta-shipping/jobs/275521-senior-software-e... to learn more.
